summary: The diff implements REQ-1 and REQ-2 completely: Barnali Chakraborty's image was replaced with the new professional headshot (barnali-founder.dim_400x400.png) and aggressive cache-busting was implemented using timestamp query parameters, DOM manipulation via useEffect, and unique React keys. However, REQ-3 (deployment to draft environment first) is not evidenced in the code changes, which only show source code modifications without deployment artifacts or environment-specific configurations.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the image replacement to draft environment first for verification before pushing to production
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of draft environment deployment in the diff. The changes show only source code modifications to frontend/src/components/CoreTeam.tsx and backend/main.mo, but no deployment configurations, environment-specific settings, or deployment artifacts that would indicate draft environment deployment has occurred.

hallucinated_features.description: Modification to backend/main.mo file adding a getCanisterId() function
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest makes no mention of backend changes or canister ID functionality. The scope is limited to frontend image replacement and cache-busting for the CoreTeam component only.
